name: Awesome View Count
author: Prakash Parghi

sections.description: Introducing ‘Awesome Post View Counts’ – a powerful WordPress feature designed to showcase the number of times your posts have been viewed by your visitors. This incredible tool allows you to gain insight into your audience’s interests and preferences, enabling you to create more engaging and relevant content that resonates with them.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Go to the Plugins page and activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
Where the counts will display

Go to ‘All Posts’ page at admin console, there is a column named ‘Views’ – where it display counts for each post

short_description: A powerful WordPress Plugin designed to showcase the number of times your posts or page have been viewed by your visitors.
